name: PhoneNumberValidateFree
description:
Free and easy. Validate any phone number, from any country.
Get type of number (for example, fixed line or mobile), the location of the number, and also reformat the number into local and international dialing formats.

api_methods.name: Validate
api_methods.description:
Free and easy. Validate any phone number, from any country.
Get type of number (for example, fixed line or mobile), the location of the number, and also reformat the number into local and international dialing formats.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description:
1_ Option: local format (without prefix):
Example: 94887799

2_ Option: format E 164:
Recommended: starting with symbol + followed by country prefix and number, without blank spaces
Remark: the + symbol in a url is escaped for the text %2B leaving %2B59894887799
Example: +59894887799 

1_ Opción: formato local (sin prefijo):
Ejemplo: 94887799

2_ Opción: formato E 164:
Recomendado: comenzando con símbolo + seguido de prefijo país y número, sin espacios en blanco
Observación: el símbolo + en una url se escapea para el texto %2B quedando %2B59894887799
Ejemplo: +59894887799

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Format: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code
Remark: in capital letters.
Optional if the number parameter starts with the + symbol 

Formato: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code
Observación: en mayúsculas.
Opcional si el parametro number comienza con el símbolo +

constraints.inter-dependency: number, country: country is optional if the number parameter starts with the + symbol.

utterances.utterance: Can you validate the phone number +14155552671?
I need to check the details for the number 02079460056 in the UK.
What can you tell me about the number 03012345678 in Germany?
I'd like to verify the phone number +61234567890.
Can you provide information on the number 0123456789 in France?
Check the phone number +81312345678 for me.
Validate the number 0912345678 in Italy, please.
Could you verify the phone number +5511987654321?
I want to know more about the number 0712345678 in South Africa.
